1.12.2.2.0.0:
Rewrote entire mod
Added addon support, see source's resources/assets/ for example
API at source's com/aaronhowser1/dymm/api
1.12.2.1.2.0:
A ton of internal changes
All Tinkers' Construct Tables now have descriptions
Mod info page now shows a list of all documented mods, as well as if they're loaded and up to date
Corrected Tinkers' Construct's durability modifier to say it adds 20% chance to not use durability, rather than 10%
Documented Quark's Danger Sight and Resilience potion effects
Documented a lot more of Quark, as well as created a new config (Quark Decor)
1.12.2.1.1.1:
Fixed Wireless Crafting Grid description, used to only show on Creative Wireless Crafting Grid
Added description to Orange Slimesling
Added descriptions to Crafting Station, Part Chest, Pattern Chest, Tool Forge, and Tool Station
Fixed Bolt Cores not showing description
Added information to Iron Chests
Updated information for Quark 200
1.12.2.1.1.0:
Complete overhaul of the internals, done by TheSilkMiner
Items with NBT, such as Enchanted Books and TiCon tools, can now have descriptions
Tooltips are now possible
Fixed some typos and missing item descriptions
1.12.2.1.0.2:
Fixed typo in Crafter Manager description
Fixed Waystones mod descriptions not working
Added config option to log when each mod gets documented
Added/changed stuff for Quark 200 (before it's even released, gasp)
Improved description for Redstone Inductor, Grate, and Gravisand, now that we know what those actually are
Got rid of Quark Vanilla's per-item config, now it just checks to see quark's config if it's enabled or not
1.12.2.1.0.1:
Super sneaky update before the mod is even released
Added information for the Uncrafting Table
Fixed only the first Castle Door having information
